definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: Sam Di) (newness), new moon, month (on format. cf. Lg:BN 144; on usage, names, etc., Muss-Arnolt:JBL 1892, 72 ff., 160 ff.)—´[[ח]] abs. Ge 7:11 +; cstr. (rare) Ge 29:14 +; sf. [[חָדְשׁוֹ]] Nu 28:14 + 2 t.; [[חָדְשָׁהּ]] Ho 2:13, Je 2:24; pl. [[חֳדָשִׁים]] Ge 38:24 +; cstr. [[חָדְשֵׁי]] Ex 12:2 + 2 t.; sf. [[חֳדָשָׁיו]] Job 14:5 + 2 t.; [[חָדְשֵׁיכֶם]] Is 1:14, Nu 28:11; [[חָדְשֵׁכֶם]] Nu 10:10; —†

new moon = day, time, of new moon, as religious festival 1Sa 20:5, 1Sa 20:18, 1Sa 20:24, 1Sa 20:27, 1Sa 20:34 (Dr); cf. ´[[יאׁכְלֵם ח]] Ho 5:7 a new moon shall devour them, Hi St VB, but on txt. v. We; usu. ‖[[שַׁבָּת]] Am 8:5, 2Ki 4:23, Is 1:13 (+ [[קְרׂא]] [[מִקְרָא]]), [[מִדֵּי חׂדֶשׁ בְּחָדְשׁוֹ]] Is 66:23, Ez Eze 46:1, Eze 46:6 (both ´[[יוֹם הַח]]), 1Ch 23:31, 2Ch 2:3, 2Ch 8:13, 2Ch 31:3, Ne 10:34 (all + [[מוֹעֵד]]), Ho 2:13, Ez Eze 45:17 (both + [[חג]], [[מועד]]); ‖[[מוֹעֵד]] alone Is 1:14, Ez Eze 3:5; ‖[[יוֹם חַגֵּנוּ]] Ps 81:4; (cf. ´[[ראׁשׁ הַח]] Nu 10:10, Nu 28:11; on religious observance of new moon cf. Di:Lv p. 578 f Benz:Archäol. § 69); as time of augury in Babylon (astrolog. prognost.) Is 47:13. †
month (as beginning with new moon, lunar month; cf. Benz:Archäol. § 30, but then, without ref. to day of beginning); †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as measure of time during which Ge 38:24 (J), Nu 11:20, Nu 11:21 (JE), Nu 9:22 (P), Ju Jdg 11:37, Jdg 11:38, Jdg 11:39, Jdg 20:47, 1Sa 6:1, 1Sa 27:7, 2Sa 2:11, 2Sa 5:5, 2Sa 6:11, 2Sa 24:8, 2Sa 24:13 = 1Ch 21:12, Am 4:7, 1Ki 4:7, 1Ki 5:7, 1Ki 5:28, 1Ki 5:28, 1Ki 5:28, 1Ki 11:16, 2Ki 15:8, 2Ki 23:31, 2Ki 24:8, Ez Eze 39:12, Eze 39:14, 1Ch 3:4, 1Ch 13:14, 2Ch 36:2, 2Ch 36:9, Es 2:12, Es 2:2; Es 2:12, Es 2:12. In 1Sa 10:27 b rd. prob. [[כְּמֵחׂדֶשׁ]] for MT [[כמחרישׁ]], and join to 1Sa 11:1, so LXX We Dr (cf. Ge 38:24); in combinations, [[יָמִים]] ´[[ח]] a month (of) time (cf. [[יֶרַח ימים]] De 21:1, 2Ki 15:13) Ge 29:14 (J), Nu 11:20, Nu 11:26 (JE), ´[[ימים ארבעה ח]] Ju Jdg 19:2; of age ´[[מִסְפַּר־ח]] number of his months = length of his life Job 14:5, Job 21:21; cf. esp. ´[[בֶּן־ח]] Le 27:6, Nu 3:15, Nu 3:22, Nu 3:28, Nu 3:34, Nu 3:39, Nu 3:40, Nu 3:43, Nu 18:16, Nu 26:22 (all P). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: calendar months, † (1) with names [[הָאָבִיב]] ´[[ח]] Ex 13:4, Ex 23:15, Ex 34:18, Ex 34:18 (all JE; = 1st mo. Ex 12:2 P), De 16:11; [[זִו]] ´[[ח]] 1Ki 6:1 ( = 2nd mo. ib.; = [[יֶרַח זִו]] v:1Ki 6:37); cf. 1Ki 8:2 ([[הַשְּׁבִיעִי]] ´[[הַח]] = [[יֶרַךְ הָאֵתָנִים]]), 1Ki 6:38 ([[הַשְּׁמִינִי]] ´[[הַח]] = [[יֶרַח בּוּל]]); in the postex. books occur Babyl. names (v. the several words):—[[נִיסָן]] ´[[ח]] Ne 2:1, Es 3:7 ( = 1st mo. Es 3:7); [[סִיוׇן]] ´[[ח]] Es 8:9 = 3rd mo.; [[כִּסְלֵו]] ´[[ח]] Zec 7:1, Ne 1:1 ( = 9th mo. Zec 7:1); [[טֵבֵָת]] ´[[ח]] Es 2:16 = 10th mo.; [[שְׁבָט]] ´[[ח]] Zec 1:7 = 11th mo.; [[אֲדָר]] ´[[ח]] Es 3:7, Es 3:13, Es 8:12, Es 9:1 in all = 12th mo., Es 9:15, Es 9:17, Es 9:19, Es 9:21; (cf. also [[אֱלוּל]] Ne 6:15, without ´[[ח]] or [[יֶרַךְ]]; this was 6th mo.; v. further Schr:COT Ne 1:1 Benz:l. c.). † (2) merely numbered (chiefly P and late) e.g. [[הַשֵּׁנִי]] ´[[בַּח]] Ge 7:11, cf. Ge 8:4, Ge 8:5, Ge 8:14, Le 16:29, Nu 1:1, Nu 1:18 (all P) + oft. P; De 1:3 (P), 1Ki 12:32, 1Ki 12:33, 1Ki 25:1, 1Ki 25:3, 1Ki 25:8, 1Ki 25:25, 1Ki 25:27, Je 1:3 + 11 t. Je, Ez Eze 24:1, Eze 32:1, Hag 1:1, Hag 1:15, Zec 1:1, Zec 7:1, Zec 7:13, 1Ch 12:15, cf. entire list 1Ch 27:2-15, 2Ch 3:2 + 12 t. 2 Ch; Ezr 3:1 + 10 t. Ezr; Ne 7:72, Ne 8:2, Ne 8:14, Es 3:12; note esp. [[הַזֶּה לָכֶם ראׁשׁ חָדָשִָׁים רִאשׁוֹן הוּא לָכֶם]] ´[[הַח]] Ex 12:2 (P), as implying that the 1st mo. was formerly not in the spring; observe also usage of omitting ´[[ח]], e.g. [[בָּרִאשׁוֹן]] = ´[[הָר]] ´[[בַּח]] Ge 8:13, cf. v:Ge 8:5; so commonly in Ezek.:—Ez Eze 1:1, Eze 8:1, Eze 20:1, Eze 29:1, Eze 29:17, Eze 30:20, Eze 31:1, Eze 33:21, Eze 45:18, Eze 45:21, Eze 45:25 + Eze 26:1, Eze 32:17, Eze 45:20 Co; (´[[ח]] sts. expr., v. Ez Eze 24:1, Eze 32:1 supr.; on like usage with [[יום]] v. [[יום]]). (3) special phrases and usages are:—† [[עׂלַת חׂדֶשׁ בְּחָדְשׁוֹ לְחָדְשֵׁי שָׁנׇה]] Nu 28:14 (P; cf. [[יום]], and Is 66:23 supr.
); [[מִיּוֹם לְיוֹם וּמֵחׂדֶשׁ לְחׂדֶשׁ]] Es 3:7 from day to day and from month to month; [[חָדְשָׁהּ]] Je 2:24 of wild she-ass's mating time. †
